description: These almond lace biscuits with a chocolate orange centre make an irresistible gift. Don't forget to make a few extras for you to enjoy!
keywords: Choc Orange Filled Almond Lace Biscuits
name: Choc Orange Filled Almond Lace Biscuits Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300 g WW mini dark chocolate chips

recipeInstructions.text: Add a dollop of chocolate to one side of a biscuit then pop another on top to 'sandwich' them together. Serve and enjoy
